meanings.sent1: She tossed the ball to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He tossed the paper airplane across the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully tossed the toy mouse in the air.
meanings.sent4: The wind tossed the leaves in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The chef expertly tossed the salad in the air.

meanings.definition: To mix or agitate by shaking
meanings.sent1: Mom tossed the salad to mix the ingredients.
meanings.sent2: The bartender tossed the cocktail to blend the flavors.
meanings.sent3: The washing machine tossed the clothes vigorously.
meanings.sent4: The storm tossed the ship on the rough sea.
meanings.sent5: The painter tossed the colors together for a unique effect.

meanings.sent1: She tossed the old magazine into the recycling bin.
meanings.sent2: He tossed the broken toy in the trash.
meanings.sent3: The student tossed the incorrect answers aside.
meanings.sent4: The disappointed player tossed his cards on the table.
meanings.sent5: The gardener tossed the withered flowers into the compost pile.

meanings.definition: To move restlessly or with agitation
meanings.sent1: The restless child tossed and turned in bed.
meanings.sent2: The leaves tossed in the wind on a stormy night.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tossed about in the tree branches.
meanings.sent4: The waves tossed the boat up and down.
meanings.sent5: The emotions tossed her mind into chaos.
